Class Block ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
id

integer The numerical identifier of the block (changes with versions)
data

integer The data of the block: exemple the color of the wool in a /setblock
name

string The name that would be used in /setblock
mapColor

iColor The map color of the block
Block.id ¶

integer The numerical identifier of the block (changes with versions)

Block.data ¶

integer The data of the block: exemple the color of the wool in a /setblock

Block.name ¶

string The name that would be used in /setblock

Block.mapColor ¶

iColor The map color of the block
